item.title: Help me make this npc talk completely!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Add it in the Continouos dialogue method in:

Case 40:

And in case 155,
Make sure the statements are ‘else if’ statements after the first one.

item.title: Help me make this npc talk completely!
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

this is what i have in my client.java the npcs id is 252

if(NPCID == 252){
                     NpcDialogue = 124;
                     NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

and this

case 124: talk("Hello, this is the start of the new!", 252); break; case 125: talk("CHRISTMAS EVENT!", 252); break; case 126: talk("However,it's still in progress,", 252); break; case 127: talk("So keep your pants on!", 252); break; case 128: choice("Awesome!", "oh."); break;
all he says is hello,this is the start of the new!
and doesnt say the rest plz help!

Read full topic
item.source: Help me make this npc talk completely!
